effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If the target is adjacent to an object or a wall after the power roll is resolved, they are restrained until the end of their next turn. A target restrained by a dwarf can be force moved by this ability. This forced movement doesn't end the restrained condition unless the Director determines otherwise.
If the target is pushed into another creature, the target and the creature are each restrained until the end of their next turn.

items.name: Ensnaring Chains
items.target: One prone, restrained, or slowed creature

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The gunner makes a free strike against the target, and the prone, restrained, and slowed conditions on the target end. The target is then restrained (save ends).
Whenever the gunner deals rolled damage to a target, one creature or object adjacent to the target takes 3 damage.
